titleInfo.title: 45: The Dedication of Joe Nadicksbernd Field

mods.abstract: Joe Nadicksbernd was first a student athlete at CBC, playing baseball and basketball. After graduating, he became a coach in 1971, starting as an assistant baseball coach and becoming head coach in 1975. From 2000 to 2013, he worked in Athletics Administration, spending his last 10 years at CBU as Athletics Director. The baseball field was named in his honor on February 15, 2014.
